revise.name: Revision Agent
revise.description: Improves and refines ideas for clarity and impact
revise.default_prompt: Revise and improve the following idea to make it more specific, actionable, and innovative while maintaining the core concept.

investigate.name: Investigation Agent
investigate.default_prompt: Investigate the feasibility, market potential, and implementation requirements. Provide research insights, potential challenges, and success factors.

critique.name: Critique Agent
critique.description: Provides constructive criticism and identifies weaknesses
critique.default_prompt: Provide constructive critique. Identify weaknesses, hidden assumptions, potential failures, and areas for improvement.

expand.name: Expansion Agent
expand.default_prompt: Expand on this idea with additional features, use cases, and possibilities. Suggest complementary ideas and natural extensions.

synthesize.name: Synthesis Agent
synthesize.description: Combines multiple ideas into cohesive concepts
synthesize.default_prompt: Synthesize these ideas into a unified concept that leverages the strengths of each while addressing their weaknesses.

validate.name: Validation Agent
validate.description: Checks ideas against best practices and standards
validate.default_prompt: Validate this idea against industry best practices, regulatory requirements, and technical feasibility.
